title: Fed Rate Cut and Repo Intervention: What It Means for the Markets and Trading
text:
On Wednesday, the U.S. Federal Reserve concluded their September meetingUnsurprisingly, they cut their target interest rate range to 1.75-2.00%. The market-moving news, however, is what guidance we got about future rate moves, including the so-called "dot plot." It was also notable what Chair Jerome Powell had to say about the recent spike in over...

authors: What It Means For The Markets
The Fed As A Group Isn'T Completely Sold On Another Cut Yet.
